response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its immense potential impact on your business, I am confident it is worth more than its face value of $1,500,000 to you. After careful consideration, I propose to offer this exceptional product to you at an exclusive price of $1,350,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to its market value, while still ensuring a fair return for us. I trust this proposal aligns with your strategic objectives and budget considerations. I look forward to discussing the details further and exploring how we can make this opportunity mutually beneficial. Please let me know if you require any additional information or have questions regarding the product or the offer.", "product_price": 1350000}
